## Description

Validation discovery phase for Story 4. This phase executes Checks A, B, and C to validate the completeness and correctness of the implementation.

**Target Story**: Story 4 - Clean Up MCP Server Session Initialization
- Remove session tracking initialization code in MCP server
- Eliminate deprecated time-based patterns
- Simplify initialization without background tasks

## Validation Checks

### Check A: Metadata Completeness
Verify Story 4 has complete metadata in queue:
- Status is "completed"
- All required fields present (title, description, file path)
- Phase children (.d, .i, .t) exist and are properly linked
- No orphaned or malformed entries

### Check B: Acceptance Criteria Coverage
Verify all acceptance criteria from Story 4 are addressed:
- [ ] (P0) Remove `check_inactive_sessions_periodically` call from server startup
- [ ] (P0) Remove `check_interval` usage from session tracking initialization
- [ ] (P1) Simplify `initialize_session_tracking` function
- [ ] (P1) Remove related logging statements referencing deprecated params

### Check C: Implementation Traceability
Verify implementation artifacts are traceable to requirements:
- Plan file exists: `plans/4-plan.yaml`
- Implementation files match planned changes
- Git commits reference Story 4
- No untracked changes related to Story 4

## Success Criteria

**Pass**: All checks (A, B, C) complete successfully
- Mark status: `completed`
- Proceed to `-4.i` (validation_implementation)

**Fail**: One or more checks reveal issues
- Mark status: `blocked`
- Create remediation stories via `/sprint:REMEDIATE`
- Document findings in this file's "Issues Found" section
